title: How scammers trick fans on Bandcamp—and how to protect yourself
description: It’s Friday, and Invincible Shield, the long-awaited Judas Priest album, is finally out. To your surprise, it’s available on Bandcamp! You wake up the next day, only to find the album has vanished from your collection—you’ve fallen victim to a scam.

title: How safe are .NET serialization libraries against StackOverflowException
description: I have always been fascinated by .NET’s StackOverflowException. It’s interesting because it’s fundamentally different from most other exceptions—you can’t catch it with a try/catch block. When you overflow the stack, it’s game over—the runtime will terminate your process. This behavior is especially devastating for web services that are deserializing user-controlled data.
